fields.name: account_id
fields.description: The unique identifier for an EU Transaction Log contract
fields.title: EUTL ID

fields.name: year
fields.title: Year
fields.description: The time period during which the output has been summed

fields.name: tonnes_co2
fields.description: Tonnes of CO2 released in the specified year
fields.title: CO2 Emissions (Tonnes)

title: EUTL Verified Emissions
name: verified-emissions
description: This dataset reports verified emissions within the EUTL. The EU Emissions Trading System (ETS) is a central instrument of the EU's policy to fight climate change and achieve cost-efficient reductions of greenhouse gas emissions. It is the world's biggest carbon market.
